page.title: 01THE VILLAGE OF HEADCORN
page.content: The village of{Headcorn}is based on a street of shops,the High Street,which runs E - W and is over-looked by the {Parish Church}at the West end. There is a wide variety of shops selling such items as clothes,bicycles and medicines,Chinese take-away food,wines and newspapers. Apart from the Parish Church there are Catholic,Methodist and Baptist churches which thrive. There are two sub-branch banks,a post office and agencies for Building Societies. All of this goes to make up a very busy{shopping centre}which attracts people from much of the surrounding countryside. In fact on Saturdays the High Street is packed with shoppers and also cars. There are several open spaces for children to play upon and two sports fields for cricket and football. There is also a {Primary School}of course!
